mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUGGESTION VALUES ( suggestion_seq.nextval, #{suggestTitle}, #{userId}, #{suggestContent}, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_DATE + 14, 'N', #{suggestGory}, #{suggestLocal} )
mapper.select: SELECT suggest_no as suggestNo, suggest_title as suggestTitle, userid as userId, suggest_content as suggestContent, suggest_gory as suggestGory, suggest_local as suggestLocal FROM SUGGESTION WHERE suggest_no = #{suggestNo}
